citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent semi annual report to the Institutional Official (IO) was not updated upon completion of the required
semiannual evaluations, approved by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and
submitted to the IO. The inspection was completed in September and the program review was completed on 7 October
2022. Reports to the IO shall be prepared, reviewed and approved by a majority of the IACUC and updated at least once
every six month upon completion of the required semiannual evaluations.
Correct for all future semi annual evaluations.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC Administrator and Animal Care manager.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent semi annual report to the Institutional Official (IO) was not updated upon completion of the required 
semiannual evaluations, approved by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and 
submitted to the IO.  The inspection was completed in September and the program review was completed on 7 October 
2022.  Reports to the IO shall be prepared, reviewed and approved by a majority of the IACUC and updated at least once 
every six month upon completion of the required semiannual evaluations. 
 
Correct for all future semi annual evaluations. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC Administrator and Animal Care manager. 
 
End Section
